meta.description: Context Sensitive Help for the table "tx_hypestore_domain_model_product"

languageKey.label: Defines a store product.

Internal identification of the product.
International GTIN of the product.
Sets the product type.
Short, general description.
Extensive, detailed description.

Relevant to the product or related documents.
Versions of the product, which differ in various details.
Categories in which the product is available.

Generally applicable, recommended price.
Net price of the product.
Sets the tax rate for the product.
Prices for specified minimum order quantities.
Describes various features of the product.
Similar or related products.
Minimum quantity available in total for all depots.
Unit to which the product is sold.
Stocks of all depots.
Internal page, holding additional information of the product.
Website address, holding additional information of the product.
Manufacturer or producer of the product.

International 13-digit ISBN of the product.
Authors of the publication.
For distribution responsible person or institution.

For the content responsible person or institution.
Number of the edition.

Relevante bzw. dem Produkt zugehörige Dokumente.
